entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
